title: Lol I bet season 6 will be the worst by far
body:
Towers are now on fire and even the ADC can tank them.

Teambuilder and Dominion are gone. (Betting treeline is next). 

Balance team is just saying "Screw it, we're doing it live, fuck it." And pulling wild cards out of their asses.

Assassin meta creeping its head in with the new item.

Boy, can't wait to see how that Mage update is gonna go.
